name: TWO FINGER TRACK STAR
description:
Arcade Hurdle Race Game, Two Button Controls, made for Ludum Dare 34 by me ( http://luckycassette.tumblr.com/) and Framk ( http://framk.tumblr.com/ )

Right Arrow is to Run

Left Arrow is to Jump

Be mindful of Your Fatigue Meter, pushing yourself too hard will work against you.
